00020 #include "ConstraintContact.h"
00021 #include "simulation.h"

00023 namespace mknix {

00025 ConstraintContact::ConstraintContact()
00026   : Constraint()
00027 {
00028 }
00029 
00030 ConstraintContact::ConstraintContact( Node* q1_in, Node* q2_in, Node* p_in, double& alpha_in, std::string& method_in )
00031   : Constraint(alpha_in, method_in)
00032 {
00033   nodes.push_back( q1_in );
00034   nodes.push_back( q2_in );
00035   nodes.push_back( p_in );
00036 
00037   this->stiffnessMatrix.resize(3*dim, 3*dim);
00038   this->internalForces.resize(3*dim);
00039   this->lambda.resize(1);
00040   this->lambda[0]=0.0;
00041   this->phi.resize(1);
00042   this->phi_q.resize(1);
00043   this->phi_q[0].resize(3*dim);
00044   this->phi_qq.resize(1);
00045   this->phi_qq[0].resize(3*dim, 3*dim);
00046   normal.resize(dim);
00047 }
00048 
00049 ConstraintContact::~ConstraintContact()
00050 {
00051 }
00052 
00053 void ConstraintContact::calcPhi()
00054 {
00055   normal[0] = +( nodes[1]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety() );
00056   normal[1] = -( nodes[1]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx() );
00057   double normal_len = std::sqrt( normal[0]*normal[0] + normal[1]*normal[1] );
00058   normal[0] /= normal_len;
00059   normal[1] /= normal_len;
00060   //gap = rt = ||(P-Q1) · normal|| = ||(P-Q2) · normal||
00061   //         = ||0.5*( ((P-Q1) + (P-Q2)) · normal)||
00062   rh = (nodes[2]->getx() - nodes[1]->getx() ) * normal[0]
00063       +(nodes[2]->gety() - nodes[1]->gety() ) * normal[1];
00064   rt = (nodes[2]->getx() - nodes[0]->getx() ) * normal[0]
00065      + (nodes[2]->gety() - nodes[0]->gety() ) * normal[1];
00066 
00067   this->phi[0] = rt*rt ;
00068 //  if( rt < 0. ) cout << endl << "NEGATIVE GAP: " << rt << ", " << rh << endl;
00069 }
00070 
00071 void ConstraintContact::calcPhiq()
00072 {
00073   if( rt < 0. )
00074   {
00075     this->phi_q[0](0) = -normal[0]*rt;
00076     this->phi_q[0](1) = -normal[1]*rt;
00077 //    if (dim == 3)
00078 //      this->phi_q[0](2) = -2.0*( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz() ) ;
00079     
00080     this->phi_q[0](dim) = -normal[0]*rt;
00081     this->phi_q[0](dim+1) = -normal[1]*rt;
00082 //    if (dim == 3)
00083 //      this->phi_q[0](2) = -2.0*( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz() ) ;
00084     
00085     this->phi_q[0](2*dim) = 2*normal[0]*rt;
00086     this->phi_q[0](2*dim+1) = 2*normal[1]*rt;
00087 //    if (dim == 3)
00088 //      this->phi_q[0](dim+2) = +2.0*( nodes[1]->getz() - nodes[0]->getz() ) ;
00089   }
00090   else if( rt > 0. )
00091   {
00092     //this->phi_q[0].fillIdentity( 0.0 )
00093     this->phi_q[0](0) = 0.0 ;
00094     this->phi_q[0](1) = 0.0 ;
00095     if (dim == 3)
00096       this->phi_q[0](2) = 0.0 ;
00097     this->phi_q[0](dim) = 0.0 ;
00098     this->phi_q[0](dim+1) = 0.0 ;
00099     if (dim == 3)
00100       this->phi_q[0](dim+2) = 0.0 ;
00101     this->phi_q[0](2*dim) = 0.0 ;
00102     this->phi_q[0](2*dim+1) = 0.0 ;
00103     if (dim == 3)
00104       this->phi_q[0](2*dim+2) = 0.0 ;
00105   }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void ConstraintContact::calcPhiqq()
00109 {
00110   if( rt < 0. )
00111   {
00112     this->phi_qq[0](0,0) =  pow(normal[0],2)/2. ;
00113     this->phi_qq[0](0,1) =  normal[0]*normal[1]/2. ;
00114     this->phi_qq[0](0,dim) =  pow(normal[0],2)/2. ;
00115     this->phi_qq[0](0,dim+1) =  normal[0]*normal[1]/2. ;
00116     this->phi_qq[0](0,2*dim) =  -pow(normal[0],2) ;
00117     this->phi_qq[0](0,2*dim+1) =  -normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00118 
00119     this->phi_qq[0](1,0) =  normal[0]*normal[1]/2. ;
00120     this->phi_qq[0](1,1) =  pow(normal[1],2)/2. ;
00121     this->phi_qq[0](1,dim) =  normal[0]*normal[1]/2. ;
00122     this->phi_qq[0](1,dim+1) =  pow(normal[1],2)/2. ;
00123     this->phi_qq[0](1,2*dim) =  -normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00124     this->phi_qq[0](1,2*dim+1) =  -pow(normal[1],2) ;
00125 
00126     this->phi_qq[0](2,0) =  pow(normal[0],2)/2. ;
00127     this->phi_qq[0](2,1) =  normal[0]*normal[1]/2. ;
00128     this->phi_qq[0](2,dim) =  pow(normal[0],2)/2. ;
00129     this->phi_qq[0](2,dim+1) =  normal[0]*normal[1]/2. ;
00130     this->phi_qq[0](2,2*dim) =  -pow(normal[0],2) ;
00131     this->phi_qq[0](2,2*dim+1) =  -normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00132 
00133     this->phi_qq[0](3,0) =  normal[0]*normal[1]/2. ;
00134     this->phi_qq[0](3,1) =  pow(normal[1],2)/2. ;
00135     this->phi_qq[0](3,dim) =  normal[0]*normal[1]/2. ;
00136     this->phi_qq[0](3,dim+1) =  pow(normal[1],2)/2. ;
00137     this->phi_qq[0](3,2*dim) =  -normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00138     this->phi_qq[0](3,2*dim+1) =  -pow(normal[1],2) ;
00139 
00140     this->phi_qq[0](4,0) =  -pow(normal[0],2) ;
00141     this->phi_qq[0](4,1) =  -normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00142     this->phi_qq[0](4,dim) =  -pow(normal[0],2) ;
00143     this->phi_qq[0](4,dim+1) =  -normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00144     this->phi_qq[0](4,2*dim) =  2*pow(normal[0],2) ;
00145     this->phi_qq[0](4,2*dim+1) =  2*normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00146 
00147     this->phi_qq[0](5,0) =  -normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00148     this->phi_qq[0](5,1) =  -pow(normal[1],2) ;
00149     this->phi_qq[0](5,dim) =  -normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00150     this->phi_qq[0](5,dim+1) =  -pow(normal[1],2) ;
00151     this->phi_qq[0](5,2*dim) =  2*normal[0]*normal[1] ;
00152     this->phi_qq[0](5,2*dim+1) =  2*pow(normal[1],2) ;
00153 
00154 
00155     if (dim == 3){
00156 //      this->phi_qq[0](2,2) =  2.0 ;
00157 //      this->phi_qq[0](dim+2,dim+2) =  2.0 ;
00158 //      this->phi_qq[0](2,dim+2) = -2.0 ;
00159 //      this->phi_qq[0](dim+2,2) = -2.0 ;
00160     }
00161   }
00162   else if( rt > 0. )
00163   {
00164     //this->phi_qq[0].fillIdentity( 0.0 )
00165     this->phi_qq[0](0,0) = 0.0 ;
00166     this->phi_qq[0](1,1) = 0.0 ;
00167     this->phi_qq[0](dim,dim) = 0.0 ;
00168     this->phi_qq[0](dim+1,dim+1) = 0.0 ;
00169     this->phi_qq[0](2*dim,2*dim) =  0.0 ;
00170     this->phi_qq[0](2*dim+1,2*dim+1) =  0.0 ;
00171     this->phi_qq[0](0,2*dim) = 0.0 ;
00172     this->phi_qq[0](2*dim,0) = 0.0 ;
00173     this->phi_qq[0](1,2*dim+1) = 0.0 ;
00174     this->phi_qq[0](2*dim+1,1) = 0.0 ;
00175     this->phi_qq[0](dim,2*dim) = 0.0 ;
00176     this->phi_qq[0](2*dim,dim) = 0.0 ;
00177     this->phi_qq[0](dim+1,2*dim+1) = 0.0 ;
00178     this->phi_qq[0](2*dim+1,dim+1) = 0.0 ;
00179     if (dim == 3){
00180 //      this->phi_qq[0](2,2) = 0.0 ;
00181 //      this->phi_qq[0](2,dim+2) = 0.0 ;
00182 //      this->phi_qq[0](dim+2,2) = 0.0 ;
00183 //      this->phi_qq[0](dim+2,dim+2) = 0.0 ;
00184     }
00185   }
00186 }
